channel.title: Good samsung screen
channel.description: Hello do you guy's know about any good gaming Samsung screens. I need a screen that has at least a 4ms response time, good color, and looks good, while playing games. The resolution also has to be 1920x.

item.title: Good samsung screen
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
This screen looks okay but there are a few fair reviews of it, is there any better screens? Edit: I bought a screen today close this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Good samsung screen
item.dc:creator: Mith
item.description:
Something like this? https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16824001330&Tpk=P2370

2ms response time, FullHD (1920x1080).

It’s really not that hard you know… Samsung site -> LCD Screens -> 1920x1080 and voilá.

It’s not like they make 30 different screens; they have annual production lines like every other company.

Read full topic
